summary: Just a small edit of vampire lord armour out of personal preference.
descriptionHtml:
This is a really small texture edit of the vampire lord armour, which I made out of personal preference. I feel the metal pendulum should look independent of the cloth (leather?) behind it, so I did that. Then, it seemed natural to even up the back to match. That's all.

Just in case it bothers some people, the screenshot makes the back look almost revealing. I never looked at it from that angle before, but I checked and nothing is revealed, Bethesda kindly shrouded that part of the texture in darkness, and unless you make impossible angles with the camera you won't be able to see up there, not that there is anything revealing or "naughty" to be seen.

I may make a slightly different version with the extra ornamental back piece, if there is a request for it.
author: Mayfly53
